# File lib/bundler/dependency.rb, line 55
    def current_env?
      return true unless @env
      if Hash === @env
        @env.all? do |key, val|
          ENV[key.to_s] && (String === val ? ENV[key.to_s] == val : ENV[key.to_s] =~ val)
        end
      else
        ENV[@env.to_s]
      end
    end
